name: Reversilly
description:
Reversilly is a new type of real time chaos action game! that combines the familiar game of "Reversi" with real-time action elements.

A real time chaos action game!

Take advantage of real time and win!

Use multiple items to control the board!




– About Game Play and SNS posts –
You can post videos of your game on YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, Facebook, your own website, or any other video sharing site, whether for profit or not, for personal or corporate use.
*Please note that we are not responsible for any disaadvantages or troubles caused by Game Play or SNS postings.
